message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.
